paragraphs.content: To the chief Musician on Neginoth upon Sheminith, A Psalm of David.
paragraphs.contentHtml: To the chief Musician on Neginoth upon Sheminith, A Psalm of David.

paragraphs.content: O LORD, rebuke me not in thine anger, neither chasten me in thy hot displeasure.
paragraphs.contentHtml: O Lord, rebuke me not in thine anger, neither chasten me in thy hot displeasure.

paragraphs.content: Have mercy upon me, O LORD; for I am weak: O LORD, heal me; for my bones are vexed.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Have mercy upon me, O Lord; for I am weak: O Lord, heal me; for my bones are vexed.

paragraphs.content: My soul is also sore vexed: but thou, O LORD, how long?
paragraphs.contentHtml: My soul is also sore vexed: but thou, O Lord, how long?

paragraphs.content: Return, O LORD, deliver my soul: oh save me for thy mercies’ sake.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Return, O Lord, deliver my soul: oh save me for thy mercies’ sake.

paragraphs.content: For in death there is no remembrance of thee: in the grave who shall give thee thanks?
paragraphs.contentHtml: For in death there is no remembrance of thee: in the grave who shall give thee thanks?

paragraphs.content: I am weary with my groaning; all the night make I my bed to swim; I water my couch with my tears.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I am weary with my groaning; all the night make I my bed to swim; I water my couch with my tears.

paragraphs.content: Mine eye is consumed because of grief; it waxeth old because of all mine enemies.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Mine eye is consumed because of grief; it waxeth old because of all mine enemies.

paragraphs.content: Depart from me, all ye workers of iniquity; for the LORD hath heard the voice of my weeping.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Depart from me, all ye workers of iniquity; for the Lord hath heard the voice of my weeping.

paragraphs.content: The LORD hath heard my supplication; the LORD will receive my prayer.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The Lord hath heard my supplication; the Lord will receive my prayer.

paragraphs.content: Let all mine enemies be ashamed and sore vexed: let them return and be ashamed suddenly.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Let all mine enemies be ashamed and sore vexed: let them return and be ashamed suddenly.
